Package slatepowered.reco.rpc

Class RPCManager

java.lang.Object
slatepowered.reco.rpc.RPCManager
public class RPCManager extends Object
Provides RPC, remote object and remote event services.

    • callExchange

      public CallExchange callExchange(RemoteFunction function, slatepowered.reco.Channel channel, Object... args)
      Calls the given function on the given channel with the provided arguments passed. This creates an outgoing exchange which will exist until a response. If a function completes successfully, the completable future will complete normally with the returned value. If the functions return value is void, the value will always be null. If a function is unable to complete successfully on the remote, the response future will be completed exceptionally with a RemoteException.
      Parameters:
      function - The function.
      channel - The channel.
      args - The parameters/arguments.
      Returns:
      The call exchange.

    • callRemote

      public <T> CompletableFuture<T> callRemote(RemoteFunction function, slatepowered.reco.Channel channel, Object... args)
      Calls the given function on the given channel with the provided arguments passed. This creates an outgoing exchange which will exist until a response. If a function completes successfully, the completable future will complete normally with the returned value. If the functions return value is void, the value will always be null. If a function is unable to complete successfully on the remote, the response future will be completed exceptionally with a RemoteException.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The return type.
      Parameters:
      function - The function.
      channel - The channel.
      args - The parameters/arguments.
      Returns:
      The response future.

    • invokeRemoteEvent

      public <P> RemoteEventResult<P> invokeRemoteEvent(Class<?> itf, String name, P payload)
      Invokes the remote event matching the given name in the given interface with the given payload of type P returning the result of the invocation.
      Type Parameters:
      P - The payload type.
      Parameters:
      itf - The declaring interface of the event.
      name - The name of the remote event.
      payload - The payload.
      Returns:
      The event invocation result.
